Id: Identified application trends, technical hot spots, and leading players in the 5G domain.
Label: Identified application trends, technical hot spots, and leading players in the 5G domain.

Id: Revealed the structure, characteristics, and critical nodes of the organizational citation network.
Label: Revealed the structure, characteristics, and critical nodes of the organizational citation network.

Id: Demonstrated the flow of 5G technology knowledge among organizations via O‑I index analysis.
Label: Demonstrated the flow of 5G technology knowledge among organizations via O‑I index analysis.

Id: Established a reusable analytical model for patent‑based technology knowledge flow studies.
Label: Established a reusable analytical model for patent‑based technology knowledge flow studies.

Id: 47 trials (4824 subjects) were included.
Label: 47 trials (4824 subjects) were included.

Id: Xuezhikang had the highest probability of reducing total cholesterol and LDL‑C (SUCRA ≈ 85% and 83%).
Label: Xuezhikang had the highest probability of reducing total cholesterol and LDL‑C (SUCRA ≈ 85% and 83%).

Id: Zhibituo ranked highest for lowering triglycerides and increasing HDL‑C (SUCRA ≈ 80% and 90%).
Label: Zhibituo ranked highest for lowering triglycerides and increasing HDL‑C (SUCRA ≈ 80% and 90%).

Id: Closure and OAT appear to be equally effective for recurrent stroke prevention.
Label: Closure and OAT appear to be equally effective for recurrent stroke prevention.

Id: Closure is associated with a higher risk of atrial fibrillation.
Label: Closure is associated with a higher risk of atrial fibrillation.

Id: OAT therapy is associated with an increased risk of bleeding.
Label: OAT therapy is associated with an increased risk of bleeding.

Id: A randomized trial is recommended to determine optimal patient selection for each strategy.
Label: A randomized trial is recommended to determine optimal patient selection for each strategy.

Id: Smart‑logistics technology is in a growth stage with a clear upward, hot‑technology trend.
Label: Smart‑logistics technology is in a growth stage with a clear upward, hot‑technology trend.

Id: The IPC Temporal Network successfully forecasted six innovative logistics technologies, consistent with global roadmaps.
Label: The IPC Temporal Network successfully forecasted six innovative logistics technologies, consistent with global roadmaps.

Id: Findings provide reliable data for R&D strategy planning and technology roadmap development in the smart‑logistics sector.
Label: Findings provide reliable data for R&D strategy planning and technology roadmap development in the smart‑logistics sector.

Id: Identified and measured previously hidden cleavage lines and alignments at the actor and content levels.
Label: Identified and measured previously hidden cleavage lines and alignments at the actor and content levels.

Id: Showed that an anti‑software‑patent coalition was successfully mobilized and gained control over key frames.
Label: Showed that an anti‑software‑patent coalition was successfully mobilized and gained control over key frames.

Id: Found that the pro‑software‑patent coalition, despite being well‑organized, failed to achieve discourse sovereignty.
Label: Found that the pro‑software‑patent coalition, despite being well‑organized, failed to achieve discourse sovereignty.

Id: The proposed Bayesian network approach successfully identified technological associations among IPC codes.
Label: The proposed Bayesian network approach successfully identified technological associations among IPC codes.

Id: Performance verification using BMW-related patents demonstrated the effectiveness of the method.
Label: Performance verification using BMW-related patents demonstrated the effectiveness of the method.

Id: 30 RCTs (2602 patients) involving seven oral Chinese patent medicines were included.
Label: 30 RCTs (2602 patients) involving seven oral Chinese patent medicines were included.

Id: Bazhen granule + chemotherapy ranked highest for clinical efficacy and reducing gastrointestinal reactions; Cinobufacin capsule recommended for efficacy priority; Xiao’aiping tablet best for improving performance status/quality of life; Zhenqi Fuzheng granule best for reducing leucopenia and safety.
Label: Bazhen granule + chemotherapy ranked highest for clinical efficacy and reducing gastrointestinal reactions; Cinobufacin capsule recommended for efficacy priority; Xiao’aiping tablet best for improving performance status/quality of life; Zhenqi Fuzheng granule best for reducing leucopenia and safety.

Id: Findings are limited by the small number, quality, and potential bias of included studies, requiring confirmation by further high‑quality RCTs.
Label: Findings are limited by the small number, quality, and potential bias of included studies, requiring confirmation by further high‑quality RCTs.

Id: All combined treatments outperformed TACE alone in effective rate, 1‑year and 2‑year survival, KPS improvement, and adverse‑event reduction.
Label: All combined treatments outperformed TACE alone in effective rate, 1‑year and 2‑year survival, KPS improvement, and adverse‑event reduction.

Id: Ranking identified Shenyi Capsules, Cidan Capsules, Pingxiao Capsules, Huaier Granules, and Huisheng Oral Liquid as the most effective options.
Label: Ranking identified Shenyi Capsules, Cidan Capsules, Pingxiao Capsules, Huaier Granules, and Huisheng Oral Liquid as the most effective options.

Id: Overall evidence quality is low, requiring confirmation by high‑quality studies.
Label: Overall evidence quality is low, requiring confirmation by high‑quality studies.

Id: Solo inventors, especially those unaffiliated with organizations, are less likely to produce breakthroughs and more likely to produce very poor inventions.
Label: Solo inventors, especially those unaffiliated with organizations, are less likely to produce breakthroughs and more likely to produce very poor inventions.

Id: The collaborative advantage manifests as more than an upward shift in mean performance; it specifically trims the lower tail and expands the upper tail of the outcome distribution.
Label: The collaborative advantage manifests as more than an upward shift in mean performance; it specifically trims the lower tail and expands the upper tail of the outcome distribution.

Id: Diversity of technical experience and external network size partially mediate these effects, with experience diversity having a stronger impact on reducing poor outcomes than on generating breakthroughs.
Label: Diversity of technical experience and external network size partially mediate these effects, with experience diversity having a stronger impact on reducing poor outcomes than on generating breakthroughs.

Id: Gene‑editing development is constrained by ethics, legal issues, and cellular contamination.
Label: Gene‑editing development is constrained by ethics, legal issues, and cellular contamination.

Id: Future research will likely focus on improving the safety and efficiency of gene‑editing technologies.
Label: Future research will likely focus on improving the safety and efficiency of gene‑editing technologies.

Id: The largest subgroup exhibits clear small‑world characteristics.
Label: The largest subgroup exhibits clear small‑world characteristics.

Id: The overall network structure shows defects that constrain open‑innovation development.
Label: The overall network structure shows defects that constrain open‑innovation development.

Id: Proposed open‑innovation strategies offering theoretical guidance for policymakers and enterprises.
Label: Proposed open‑innovation strategies offering theoretical guidance for policymakers and enterprises.

Label: The WTE innovation network exhibits scale‑free characteristics, with few organizations linking to many others.

Label: Major actors are early‑movers that continue to dominate technological trajectories.

Id: Bailing capsule + ACEI/ARB was associated with a reduced incidence of adverse reactions.
Label: Bailing capsule + ACEI/ARB was associated with a reduced incidence of adverse reactions.

Label: The approach was applied to the semiconductor industry, producing a set of potential R&D partner SMEs.

Label: Provides a repeatable framework for creating effective large‑firm–SME partnerships.

Label: Strategic balancing of network position enhances technical innovation performance and firm competitiveness.

Label: Tacit knowledge recombination functions as an effective boundary‑spanning mechanism within joint‑patent networks.

Label: Revealed application trends, key technical hot spots, and dominant organizations in the 5G domain.

Id: Characterized network topology, identified critical nodes, and mapped the flow of 5G knowledge between organizations.
Label: Characterized network topology, identified critical nodes, and mapped the flow of 5G knowledge between organizations.

Id: Demonstrated a reusable analytical framework for patent‑based technology mapping.
Label: Demonstrated a reusable analytical framework for patent‑based technology mapping.

Label: Identified key technological knowledge areas and how they are linked across fields.

Label: Demonstrated the integration and connectivity of different technological domains.

Label: The model achieves performance comparable to a rule‑based expert system baseline.

Id: Represents an important initial step toward solving computational retrosynthetic analysis.
Label: Represents an important initial step toward solving computational retrosynthetic analysis.

Id: Model significantly speeds up patent search
Label: Model significantly speeds up patent search

Label: Achieves quick, accurate, comprehensive retrieval of equivalent patents

Id: Enhances detection efficiency and accuracy, benefiting patent stakeholders
Label: Enhances detection efficiency and accuracy, benefiting patent stakeholders

Label: Reinforcement‑learning ranking outperformed PageRank for capturing field evolution.

Id: Further work is needed to refine details and enable prediction of emerging technologies.

Label: Provided actionable insights for researchers, corporations, and market stakeholders.

Id: BLC showed the greatest benefit on 24 h urinary protein and triglyceride reduction.
Label: BLC showed the greatest benefit on 24 h urinary protein and triglyceride reduction.

Label: Provided insights into how patent collaborations are organized across organizations and regions in Poland.
